name: Goodnews
body:
### Welcome to Goodnews page
I welcome you all to this page. I pray that the God of the universe will always cause our ear to hear goodnews all the days of our life. Amen.


### OUR VISION
**Our vision is to see that all mankind enjoy the encitement that emmanated from the temple of God**. **we are also concerned about the well-being of our fellow men**.

### SUBJECT MATTER
**Here, we are going to be discussing about some various issues affecting ones life such as mrriage, financial issue, spiritual life, entertainment, news, etc.**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
